By mepersoner on Tuesday, December 11, 2001 - 09:18 pm:

Has anyone ever notice what an incredible pain in the ••• it is to find gold peaches? I used to find them no problem back in the day when I played, but recently I've noticed that it's like impossible to find them.

By SlapShotz54 on Thursday, July 4, 2002 - 11:53 am:

By Tararara on Wednesday, July 10, 2002 - 08:37 am:

I haven't had trouble finding Peaches in a long time. There is a big building down a hidden path, (this big building has or had a monkey statue in front of it). To the right of it is a smaller building, where it is usually easy to find Gold Peaches and Wind Drums in.

Also, the 'every ten years' is false, I believe. However, once a Monster has found a peach, he cannot ever find a second. (allthough I think i've heard that you can find two in one expidition?)
